title: 怎么禁止戴方块？
author: Ordinary_road
txt_content: 我想禁止服务器的玩家带方块，不可以使用/hat这个怎么弄！！！

replies.author: 梦~
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder -essentials.hat复制代码/mangaddp [用户组] [权限名]复制代码
{:10_492:}此插件必须得要Ess插件~~

replies.author: 梦~
replies.txt_content: 说错啦 是此指令必须得要Essentials.GroupManager 支持

replies.author: Ordinary_road
replies.txt_content:
Menzor 发表于 2015-3-6 23:43
说错啦 是此指令必须得要Essentials.GroupManager 支持
是不可以使用哦=。=

replies.author: Knowsngs
replies.txt_content: 其实就是设置权限组里的hat指令禁止……←_←

replies.author: Ordinary_road
Knowsngs
replies.txt_content:
Ordinary_road 发表于 2015-3-7 00:49
已解决
{:10_564:}没事反正蹭点经验~

replies.author: Ordinary_road
replies.txt_content:
